name: Data engineer
description:
Project Description:

We are hiring for projects in the Middle East. There are many opportunities in the region. Our team consists of frontend and backend developers, data analysts and data scientists, architects, analysts and project managers.

Responsibilities:

  • Participate in requirement clarification and sprint planning
  • Design technical solution and present technical data concepts to stakeholders
  • Implement and deploy data solutions and pipelines using primarily PySpark
  • Implement best practices patterns
  • Engage with stakeholders and take ownership of deliverables
  • Understand business problems and offer technical solutions
  • Improve productivity by using automation where applicable

Mandatory Skills Description:

  • ETL: process of transforming the data from a source
  • PySpark or pandas preferred. 4+ years
  • Scripting languages:
  • Python, SQL, 4+ years (experience with other scripting languages may be considered)
  • Algorithm and Data structures: understanding of the commonly used algorithms
  • Experience with working in an agile environment (CI/CD, Code review, Unit tests…)
  • Strong problem solving skills
  • English: C1 Advanced

Nice-to-Have Skills:

Strong in Mathematics/knowledge of Financial Markets and Asset Classes
Bachelors degree in IT/Computer Science or related fiel
